Summary: Underside brilliant not emitting, Top side dark. Moved slow in straight line then stopped and turned upwards at approximately 45 degree angle should not have stayed in air for slow speed.
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding in back yard around 10 PM, object came out from behind tree in neighbors yard when I first saw it, from the tree to the hillside is a short distance yet it took the object a number of seconds to move between these two points.The underside was brilliant light to the consistancy of how I would explain it as water right before it boils.(rolling) Made no sound what so ever, no wings and at the speed that it was moving it should have fallen out of the sky. Moved in a straight direction till it got to the hillside when it stopped and began to tury upwards in about a 45 degree direction before continuing in an upward direction at the same speed.For a brief moment I could see the top of the craft, dark in color, looked like it was sectioned together. No windows noticed.
